Name: Open Systems Logs API
Author: Open Systems - support@opensystems.com
Description:
Designed to empower security teams, the Open Systems Data Connector for Microsoft Sentinel delivers log data to customers. It seamlessly integrates with Microsoft Sentinel, extracting vital details and pushing them directly into the platform to provide SOC teams and incident responders with insights into user behavior.
  
  **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** 

 This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies:

  a. [Azure Monitor Data Collection](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/essentials/data-collection-rules)



  b. [Azure Container Apps](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/container-apps/)
